Name: Name Change, Harold Rapkin Plaza, Bronx
Title: A Local Law in relation to naming eleven public thoroughfares and public places, Harold Rapkin Plaza, Borough of The Bronx, The Ramblersville-Hawtree Memorial Bridge, Borough of Queens, Donna and Michele Blanchard Plaza, Borough of Brooklyn, Arthur Hayes Way, Borough of Queens, Teddy White Place, Borough of Queens, John Downing Park, Borough of Queens, Boulevard of Bravery, Borough of Queens, Lawrence Virgilio Playground, Borough of Queens, Fred Wilson Way, Borough of Queens, Plaza of Heroes, Borough of Queens and Detective David Allen Way, Borough of Brooklyn.
BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

History.AgendaNote: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs and International Intergroup Relations

History.BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations
Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations
Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations
Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1.  The following plaza name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
_________________________________________________________________
New name 			Present name 			Limits___________                     

Harold Rapkin Plaza 	None 				the west side of Paulding
Avenue at its intersection with the Esplanade
_________________________________________________________________

	Section 2.  The following bridge name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
_________________________________________________________________
New name 			Present name 			Limits___________                     

The Ramblersville-		102nd Street Lenihan's	between 160th Avenue and
Hawtree Memorial 		Bridge				163rd Avenue
Bridge
_________________________________________________________________

      Section 3.  The following plaza name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
_________________________________________________________________
New name 			Present name 			Limits___________                     

Donna and Michele		(none)				the intersection of 92nd 
Blanchard Plaza						Street and Fort Hamilton 
								Parkway
_________________________________________________________________

      Section 4.  The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
_________________________________________________________________
New name 			Present name 			Limits___________                     

Arthur Hayes Way		32nd Avenue			between 103rd Street and
								104th Street
_________________________________________________________________
      
      Section 5.  The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
_________________________________________________________________
New name 			Present name 			Limits___________

Teddy White Place		57th Street			between 30th Avenue and
								31st Avenue
_________________________________________________________________

      Section 6.  The following park name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
_________________________________________________________________
New name 			Present name 			Limits___________

John Downing Park		(none)				existing park at 50th Street
								and 43rd Avenue
_________________________________________________________________

      Section 7.  The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
_________________________________________________________________
New name 			Present name 			Limits___________

Boulevard of Bravery	Queens Boulevard		between 63rd Street and
								65th Place
_________________________________________________________________

      Section 8.  The following playground name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
_________________________________________________________________
New name 			Present name 			Limits___________

Lawrence Virgilio		(none)				existing playground
Playground							located at 52nd Street and
								39th Drive in Windmuller
								Park
_________________________________________________________________

      Section 9.  The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
_________________________________________________________________
New name 			Present name 			Limits___________

Fred Wilson Way		Bedell Street			between Baisley Boulevard
								and Farmers Boulevard
_________________________________________________________________

      Section 10.  The following plaza name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
_________________________________________________________________
New name 			Present name 			Limits___________

Plaza of Heroes		(none)				the intersection of Perry 
								Avenue and 68th Street
_________________________________________________________________

      Section 11.  The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
_________________________________________________________________
New name 			Present name 			Limits___________

Detective David Allen	Tompkins Avenue		between Flushing Avenue
Way								and Fulton Street
_________________________________________________________________

	Section 12.  This local law shall take effect immediately.
